name: Maguu Kenki
storytext: Even today, it still patrols the place where fate was severed.
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Maguu Kenki

skills.name: Blustering Blade
skills.description: Deals 1 Anemo DMG, summons 1 Shadowsword: Lone Gale.

skills.name: Frosty Assault
skills.description: Deals 1 Cryo DMG, summons 1 Shadowsword: Galloping Frost.

skills.name: Pseudo Tengu Sweeper
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], triggers the effect(s) of all your <color=#FFFFFFFF>Shadowsword</color> Summon(s). (Does not consume their Usages)
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 6 {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>, triggers the effect(s) of all your <color=#FFFFFFFF>Shadowsword</color> Summon(s). (Does not consume their Usages)
skills.description: Deals 6 Anemo DMG, triggers the effect(s) of all your Shadowsword Summon(s). (Does not consume their Usages)
